```
<Location /server-status>
  SetHandler server-status
  Order allow,deny
  Allow from all
</Location>
```

```
<VirtualHost *:8080>
   DocumentRoot /var/www/html
   ServerName servername.domain.com

  <Location /server-status>
    SetHandler server-status
    Order allow,deny
    Allow from all
  </Location>
</VirtualHost>
```

```
<Location /server-status>
  SetHandler server-status
  Order deny, allow
  Deny from all
  Allow from localhost
</Location>
```
